Description: Binary indicator of diabetes status (0 = No, 1 = Yes)
High blood pressure status (0 = No, 1 = Yes)
High cholesterol status (0 = No, 1 = Yes)
Cholesterol check in past 5 years (0 = No, 1 = Yes)
Body Mass Index (BMI) value
Smoking status (0 = No, 1 = Yes)
History of stroke (0 = No, 1 = Yes)
History of heart disease or heart attack (0 = No, 1 = Yes)
Physical activity in past 30 days (0 = No, 1 = Yes)
Consumes fruit 1 or more times per day (0 = No, 1 = Yes)
Consumes vegetables 1 or more times per day (0 = No, 1 = Yes)
Heavy alcohol consumption (Men >14 drinks/week, Women >7 drinks/week) (0 = No, 1 = Yes)
Has any form of healthcare coverage (0 = No, 1 = Yes)
Could not see doctor due to cost in past year (0 = No, 1 = Yes)
Self-rated general health status (1 = Excellent to 5 = Poor)
Number of days mental health not good in past 30 days (0–30)
Number of days physical health not good in past 30 days (0–30)
Difficulty walking or climbing stairs (0 = No, 1 = Yes)
Biological sex (0 = Female, 1 = Male)
Age category (coded from 1 = 18–24 to 13 = 80+)
Education level (1 = Never attended to 6 = College 4 years or more)
Income level (1 = Less than $10,000 to 8 = $75,000+)
